jei.tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.band_of_: You can find it in the Magician's Cabin
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.magic_cuffs: Restore 10 times the mana value of the damage received after injury
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.magnet_flowe: When you need mana, automatically use the mana potion in your backpack
